name: Mr.B The Gentleman Rhymer
description: '''Jim Burke''', known professionally as '''Mr.B The Gentleman Rhymer''', is a British [[parody|parodist]] who performs "[[chap hop]]" â€“ [[hip hop music|hip hop]] delivered in a [[Received Pronunciation]] accent.  Mr.B raps, or "rhymes", about good manners, dressing with style and dignity, sophisticated society, [[pipe smoking]] and [[cricket]] while playing the [[banjolele]]. The character is described as having grown up in [[Cheam]] and attending [[Sutton Grammar School]].
